question: ሰላም?
answer: ሰላም ነው! ምን ልረዳዎ እችላለሁ? (DEMO)

question: እንዴት ነህ?
answer: ደህና ነኝ፣ አመሰግናለሁ። ምን ልረዳዎ እችላለሁ? (DEMO)

question: ምን ልትረዳኝ ትችላለህ?
answer: ስለ ኦሮሚያ ክልል መንግስት አገልግሎቶች እንደ ፓስፖርት፣ የማዘጋጃ ቤት አገልግሎቶች እና የፍጆታ አገልግሎቶች መረጃ መስጠት እችላለሁ። (DEMO)

question: አመሰግናለሁ
answer: ምንም አይደል! ሌላ እርዳታ ከፈለጉ እዚህ ነኝ። (DEMO)

question: Hello
answer: Hello! How can I help you today? (DEMO)

question: Hi
answer: Hi there! How can I assist you? (DEMO)

question: How are you?
answer: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you today? (DEMO)

question: How can you help me?
answer: I can provide information about Oromia Regional Government services such as Passport, Municipality, and Utility services. (DEMO)

question: Thank you
answer: You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else. (DEMO)

question: Akkam?
answer: Akkam Nagaakeeti! Maal si gargaaruu? (DEMO)

question: Nagayaa?
answer: Nagayaa kooti, galatoomi. Maal si gargaaruu? (DEMO)

question: Maal na gargaaruu dandeessu?
answer: Tajaajiloota mootummaa Naannoo Oromiyaa kanneen akka paaspoortii, tajajila munisipaalaafi bilbilaa irratti ragaa siif kennun danda'a. (DEMO)

question: Galatoomi
answer: Homaa miti! Tajaajila biraa yoo barbaadde asuma jira. (DEMO)

question: የመኖሪያ ቤት ፍቃድ ለማግኘት ምን ያስፈልጋል?
answer: የመኖሪያ ቤት ፍቃድ ለማግኘት ማመልከቻ፣ የቦታው ካርታ፣ የባለቤትነት ማረጋገጫ እና የንብረት ታክስ ክፍያ ደረሰኝ ማቅረብ ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: አዲስ የንግድ ሥራ እንዴት ማስመዝገብ እችላለሁ?
answer: አዲስ ንግድ ለማስመዝገብ መታወቂያዎን ይዘው ወደ ንግድ ቢሮ መሄድ ይኖርብዎታል። (DEMO)

question: የቤት ግብር የት ነው የምከፍለው?
answer: የቤት ግብር በማዘጋጃ ቤት የግብር ቢሮዎች ወይም በመንግስት የክፍያ አማራጮች መክፈል ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: የልደት ምስክር ወረቀት እንዴት ማግኘት እችላለሁ?
answer: የልደት ምስክር ወረቀትን በአቅራቢያዎ በሚገኝ የቀበሌ ወይም የከተማ አስተዳደር ቢሮ ማመልከት ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: What documents are required to obtain a house permit?
answer: To obtain a house permit, you need to submit an application, land map, proof of ownership, and a property tax payment receipt. (DEMO)

question: How do I register a new business?
answer: To register a new business, you need to visit the local trade bureau with your ID and completion of the required forms. (DEMO)

question: Where can I pay my property tax?
answer: Property taxes can be paid at any designated municipality tax office or via official online portals. (DEMO)

question: How can I get a birth certificate?
answer: You can apply for a birth certificate at your local Kebele or City Administration office. (DEMO)

question: Ijaarsa mana jireenyaaaf Injinerri ni barbaachisaa?
answer: Ijaarsa mana jireenyaaaf Injinerri barbaachisaa miti, garuu qabxiwwan armaan gadii guutuun dirqama: (DEMO)

question: Galmeessa daldalaa haaraa akkamitti raawwadha?
answer: Galmeessa daldalaa haaraaf ragaa eenyummaa keettiin gara biiroo daldalaatti deemuu qabdu. (DEMO)

question: Kaffaltii gibira manaa eessatti kaffaluu danda'a?
answer: Gibira manaa waajjiraalee munisipaalaatti ykn karaa kallattii onlaayinii kaffaluun ni danda'ama. (DEMO)

question: Ragaa dhalootaa akkamitti argachuu danda'a?
answer: Ragaa dhalootaa argachuuf waajjira bulchiinsa gandaa keetii gaafachuun ni danda'ama. (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለማውጣት ምን ዓይነት ሰነዶች ያስፈልጋሉ?
answer: የተሞላ ማመልከቻ፣ መታወቂያ/የትውልድ ማረጋገጫ፣ የቅርብ ጊዜ ፎቶ፣ እና የክፍያ ደረሰኝ ይያዙ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት የት ላይ መጠየቅ ይቻላል?
answer: በዋና የኢሚግሬሽን ቢሮ ወይም በተመዘገቡ የክልል ፓስፖርት አገልግሎት ቢሮዎች መጠየቅ ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ክፍያ ስንት ነው?
answer: ክፍያው እንደ አገልግሎት ፍጥነትና የፓስፖርት አይነት ይለያያል፤ ኦፊሴላዊ የክፍያ መረጃን ይመልከቱ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመውጣት ስንት ጊዜ ይወስዳል?
answer: መደበኛ ሂደት ብዙ ሳምንታት ሊወስድ ይችላል፤ ፈጣን አገልግሎት ግን በተጨማሪ ክፍያ እንዲቀጥን ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት በመስመር ላይ መጠየቅ ይቻላል?
answer: አንዳንድ ደረጃዎች ኦንላይን ሊሰሩ ይችላሉ፣ ነገር ግን ለባዮሜትሪክ መመዝገብ በአካል መገኘት ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለስንት ዓመት ይሠራል?
answer: የትክክለኛ ጊዜ ቆይታ እንደ አመልካቹ ምድብ 5 ወይም 10 ዓመት ሊሆን ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የጊዜው ያለፈ ፓስፖርት እንዴት እታደሳለሁ?
answer: የቀድሞ ፓስፖርት፣ የማሻሻያ ማመልከቻ፣ ፎቶዎች እና የክፍያ ደረሰኝ በማቅረብ መታደስ ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርትን ከመጨረሻ ቀኑ በፊት መታደስ እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ ከመያዣ ጊዜው በፊት በተወሰነ ወቅት ውስጥ ቀድሞ መታደስ ይፈቀዳል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ቢጠፋ ምን ማድረግ አለብኝ?
answer: ወዲያውኑ ለፖሊስ ሪፖርት አድርጉ እና ከሪፖርቱ ጋር የመተካት ማመልከቻ ያቅርቡ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ቢበላሽ ምን ይደረጋል?
answer: የተበላሸውን ፓስፖርት ከማብራሪያ ደብዳቤ ጋር በማቅረብ መተካት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ህፃናት ፓስፖርት መውጣት ይችላሉ?
answer: አዎ፣ ለአነስተኛ ዕድሜ የወላጅ/አሳዳጊ ፈቃድ እና የህጋዊ ማረጋገጫ ሰነዶች ያስፈልጋሉ። (DEMO)

question: ለህፃን ፓስፖርት ምን ሰነዶች ያስፈልጋሉ?
answer: የትውልድ ማረጋገጫ፣ የወላጆች መታወቂያ፣ የፈቃድ ደብዳቤ እና ፎቶ ይጠየቃሉ። (DEMO)

question: ለህፃን ፓስፖርት ሁለቱም ወላጆች መገኘት ያስፈልጋል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አዎ፤ ካልተቻለ ግን የህግ ማረጋገጫ (ለምሳሌ የፍርድ ቤት ውሳኔ) ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: አሳዳጊ በህፃን ስም መጠየቅ ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ የአሳዳጊነት ህጋዊ ሰነድ ካለ መመልከት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ባዮሜትሪክ ምዝገባ ምንድነው?
answer: የጣት አሻራ፣ ፎቶ እና ፊርማ ያሉ የመለያ መረጃዎችን በቢሮ ላይ መመዝገብ ነው። (DEMO)

question: ባዮሜትሪክ መመዝገብ ግዴታ ነው?
answer: አዎ፣ ብዙ አገልግሎቶች ለመስጠት የባዮሜትሪክ መረጃ መመዝገብ ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: አረጋውያን ባዮሜትሪክ ሳይሰጡ መውጣት ይቻላል?
answer: በዕድሜ ወይም በጤና ሁኔታ መሰረት ልዩ መተግበሪያ ሊኖር ይችላል፤ ቢሮውን ይጠይቁ። (DEMO)

question: ለፓስፖርት የሚያስፈልገው ፎቶ እንዴት መሆን አለበት?
answer: ነጭ ጀርባ፣ ግልጽ ፊት፣ የቅርብ ጊዜ ፎቶ እና መመሪያዎችን የሚከተል መሆን አለበት። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ፎቶ ላይ ፈገግታ ማድረግ ይፈቀዳል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አይፈቀድም፤ አስተዳደራዊ ምርመራ ስለሚያስፈልግ ነጻ/መደበኛ ፊት ተጠያቂ ነው። (DEMO)

question: ማመልከቻዬ ቢቀርብ እና ቢታቀቅ ምን ይሆናል?
answer: ምክንያቱ ይገለጻል እና ምን መስተካከል እንዳለብዎ መመሪያ ይሰጥዎታል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማመልከቻ ሁኔታ መከታተል እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ በማመልከቻ መመዝገቢያ ቁጥር/ሪፈረንስ ሁኔታውን ማየት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ፈጣን የፓስፖርት አገልግሎት ምንድነው?
answer: በተጨማሪ ክፍያ የማስፈጸሚያ ጊዜን የሚቀንስ አማራጭ አገልግሎት ነው። (DEMO)

question: ፈጣን አገልግሎት ለማግኘት ማን ይችላል?
answer: በአስቸኳይ ጉዞ ምክንያት ያለው ሰው ማስረጃ ካቀረበ ሊያገኝ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ስሜን መቀየር እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ የፍርድ ቤት ውሳኔ ወይም የጋብቻ ማረጋገጫ ያሉ ህጋዊ ሰነዶች ካሉ ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ስህተት ካለ እንዴት እጠግናለሁ?
answer: ስህተቱን የሚያሳይ ማስረጃ ሰነዶች በማቅረብ የማስተካከያ ሂደት መጀመር ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ስህተቱ ከቢሮ ከሆነ ክፍያ ይኖራል?
answer: አንዳንድ ጊዜ የቢሮ ስህተት ከሆነ ክፍያ ሳይኖር ሊታረም ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሊያልቅ ከሆነ መጓዝ እችላለሁ?
answer: ብዙ አገሮች ቢያንስ 6 ወር የቀረ ትክክለኛነት ይጠይቃሉ፤ ቅድሚያ ያረጋግጡ። (DEMO)

question: ከአገር ውጭ ሳለሁ ፓስፖርቴ ቢያልቅ ምን አድርጋለሁ?
answer: ቅርብ ያለ ኤምባሲ/ኮንሱላት ያነጋግሩ እና የሚሰጠውን መመሪያ ይከተሉ። (DEMO)

question: ሁለት ፓስፖርት መያዝ ይቻላል?
answer: በህግ ስር በተወሰኑ ሁኔታዎች ብቻ ሊፈቀድ ይችላል፤ የአገሩን መመሪያ ይመልከቱ። (DEMO)

question: ማሽን-ሪዳብል (Machine-readable) ፓስፖርት ምንድነው?
answer: በስካነር ሊነበብ የሚችል የኮድ መረጃ ያለበት ፓስፖርት ነው። (DEMO)

question: ኢ-ፓስፖርት (e-Passport) ምንድነው?
answer: የባዮሜትሪክ መረጃ የያዘ ቺፕ ያለበት ኤሌክትሮኒክ ፓስፖርት ነው። (DEMO)

question: ኢ-ፓስፖርት መውጣት ግዴታ ነው?
answer: እየተለመደ ቢሆንም አገልግሎቱ እና አይነቱ እንደ አገር/ቢሮ ሊለያይ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ከአገር ውጭ ሆኜ ፓስፖርት መውጣት እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ በኤምባሲ/ኮንሱላት በኩል ማመልከት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ከውጭ አገር ፓስፖርት ማውጣት ስንት ጊዜ ይወስዳል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ ከውስጥ አገር አገልግሎት ይልቅ ሊዘገይ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ክፍያ እንዴት ይከፈላል?
answer: በባንክ ዲፖዚት ወይም በተፈቀዱ የክፍያ ቻናሎች መክፈል ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ክፍያ መመለስ ይቻላል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ የፓስፖርት ክፍያ አይመለስም። (DEMO)

question: ጊዜያዊ የጉዞ ሰነድ ምንድነው?
answer: ፓስፖርት ሲጠፋ/ሲያገለግል በአስቸኳይ ጉዞ ለማድረግ የሚሰጥ ሰነድ ነው። (DEMO)

question: ጊዜያዊ የጉዞ ሰነድ ማን ሊያገኝ ይችላል?
answer: የአስቸኳይ ጉዞ ምክንያት ያለው ዜጋ ማስረጃ ካቀረበ ሊቀበል ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ አድራሻዬን ማዘመን ያስፈልጋል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አድራሻ መቀየር የፓስፖርት መተካት አያስፈልግም፣ ግን መመሪያ ይጠይቁ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለማመልከት ቀጠሮ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: እንደ ቢሮው ብዛት ቀጠሮ ማስያዝ ሊያስፈልግ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ቀጠሮ እንዴት እያዝ?
answer: በመስመር ላይ ወይም በቢሮ በቀጥታ መቀጠር ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ቀጠሮዬ በደረሰ ቀን ምን አመጣ?
answer: የመጀመሪያ ሰነዶች፣ ኮፒዎች፣ ፎቶ፣ እና የክፍያ ደረሰኝ ይያዙ። (DEMO)

question: ሌላ ሰው በስሜ ፓስፖርት ሊወስድ ይችላል?
answer: በአንዳንድ ሁኔታ በህጋዊ ውክልና/ፈቃድ ይፈቀዳል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርቴ ዝግጁ ሲሆን እንዴት እለቃለሁ?
answer: በSMS/ኢሜይል ማሳወቂያ ወይም በሪፈረንስ ቁጥር ሁኔታ በመመልከት መረዳት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ቀጠሮዬን ካመለስኩ ምን ይሆናል?
answer: እንደ ፖሊሲ ዳግም ማስያዝ/ማቀጠር ሊኖር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: እርጉዝ ሴቶች ቅድሚያ አገልግሎት ያገኛሉ?
answer: በጤና ሁኔታ መሰረት ልዩ ድጋፍ/ቅድሚያ ሊሰጥ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: አካል ጉዳተኞች ለፓስፖርት ልዩ ድጋፍ አለ?
answer: አዎ፣ የአገልግሎት እርዳታ እና ቅድሚያ ሊሰጥ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት አገልግሎት የሚጠቀሙት ቋንቋዎች ምን ናቸው?
answer: እንደ ቢሮው አቅም በአገር ዋና ቋንቋዎች አገልግሎት ሊሰጥ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ስደተኞች የአገር ፓስፖርት መጠየቅ ይችላሉ?
answer: እንደ ህግ ልዩ ሂደት ሊኖር ይችላል፤ ተገቢውን ቢሮ ይጠይቁ። (DEMO)

question: ዲፕሎማቲክ ፓስፖርት ምንድነው?
answer: ለመንግስት ኃላፊዎች እና ዲፕሎማቶች ለመደበኛ የመንግስት ሥራ ጉዞ የሚሰጥ ፓስፖርት ነው። (DEMO)

question: የአገልግሎት (Service) ፓስፖርት ምንድነው?
answer: ለየተወሰኑ የመንግስት ስራዎች ውጭ ሀገር ሲሄዱ የሚሰጥ ልዩ ፓስፖርት ነው። (DEMO)

question: ዲፕሎማቲክ ፓስፖርት ማን ይወስዳል?
answer: ከፍተኛ መንግስት ኃላፊዎች እና የዲፕሎማቲክ ኃላፊነት ያላቸው ሰዎች ሊያገኙት ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ተራ ዜጋ ዲፕሎማቲክ ፓስፖርት መጠየቅ ይችላል?
answer: አይቻልም፤ ተገቢነቱ በህግ የተገደበ ነው። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ላይ ስንት ባዶ ገጽ መቀረት ይመከራል?
answer: ለቪዛ እና ማህተም ቢያንስ ሁለት ባዶ ገጾች መኖር ይመከራል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ተጨማሪ ገጽ መጨመር ይቻላል?
answer: አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ተጨማሪ ገጽ አይጨመርም፤ መታደስ/መተካት ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: አዲስ ፓስፖርት ሲወጣ አሮጌው ምን ይሆናል?
answer: አሮጌው ብዙ ጊዜ በመሰረዝ ምልክት ተደርጎ ሊመለስ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: አሮጌ ፓስፖርቴን ከታደስኩ በኋላ ልያዝ እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ ነገር ግን ለጉዞ አይጠቅምም (ተሰርዟል ተብሎ ይቆጠራል)። (DEMO)

question: የማመልከቻ ሪፈረንስ ቁጥር ምንድነው?
answer: ማመልከቻዎን ለመከታተል የሚጠቅም ልዩ መለያ ቁጥር ነው። (DEMO)

question: የጣት አሻራ መረጃ ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ ነው?
answer: አዎ፣ በጥብቅ የመረጃ ደህንነት መመሪያዎች መሠረት ይጠበቃል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሊሰረዝ ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ በህጋዊ ምክንያቶች (ለምሳሌ የተከለከለ ጉዞ) ሊሰረዝ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መስጠት በምን ህጎች ይመራል?
answer: በአገሪቱ የኢሚግሬሽን እና የዜግነት ህጎች መሠረት ይመራል። (DEMO)

question: ኦፊሴላዊ የፓስፖርት መረጃ ከየት እገኛለሁ?
answer: ከኢሚግሬሽን ቢሮ ድረ-ገጽ ወይም በቢሮዎች በቀጥታ በመጠየቅ ይገኛል። (DEMO)

question: ስለ ፓስፖርት ቅሬታ የት ልቀርብ?
answer: በቢሮው የደንበኛ አገልግሎት/ቅሬታ መቀበያ ቦታ ማቅረብ ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: መታወቂያዬ ካለቀ ፓስፖርት መጠየቅ እችላለሁ?
answer: ተገቢ መለያ ማረጋገጫ እንዲሰጥ ተገቢ የሆነ መታወቂያ መኖር ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: ለፓስፖርት ቃለ-መጠይቅ ይደረጋል?
answer: አንዳንድ አመልካቾች የተጨማሪ ማረጋገጫ ሲያስፈልግ ቃለ-መጠይቅ ሊጠሩ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ከመሰጠቱ በፊት ምን ዓይነት ምርመራ ይደረጋል?
answer: መለያ ማረጋገጫ እና የደህንነት/ህጋዊ ማጣሪያ ይደረጋል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ የጋብቻ ሁኔታ ማዘመን ይቻላል?
answer: አዎ፣ የጋብቻ ማረጋገጫ ወይም የፍቺ ሰነድ ካለ ማዘመን ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ከአገር ውጭ ፓስፖርቴ ቢሰረቅ ምን አድርግ?
answer: ለአካባቢ ፖሊስ ሪፖርት አድርጉ እና ቅርብ ያለ ኤምባሲ/ኮንሱላት ያነጋግሩ። (DEMO)

question: ህጋዊ ቅጣት/ችግኝ ካለብኝ ፓስፖርት መውጣት ይቻላል?
answer: አንዳንድ የህግ ጉዳዮች ተገቢነትን ሊጎዱ ይችላሉ፤ ቢሮውን ያረጋግጡ። (DEMO)

question: ከመጓዝ በፊት ስንት ቀድሞ መጠየቅ ይመከራል?
answer: የመስራት ጊዜ ሊዘገይ ስለሚችል ብዙ ወራት ቀድሞ ማመልከት ይመከራል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመውጣት መጀመሪያ እርምጃ ምንድነው?
answer: የማመልከቻ ፎርም መሙላት እና ተገቢ ሰነዶችን ማዘጋጀት ነው። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማመልከቻ ፎርም የት እገኛለሁ?
answer: በቢሮ ወይም በኦፊሴላዊ መስመር ላይ መድረክ ሊገኝ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ማመልከቻ ላይ ስህተት ካደረግሁ ምን ይደረጋል?
answer: በመመሪያ መሠረት ማስተካከል ይጠየቃሉ ወይም እንደገና መሞላት ሊኖር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ማመልከቻ ላይ ኢሜይል እና ስልክ ለምን ይፈለጋሉ?
answer: ለማሳወቂያ እና ሁኔታ ለማግኘት/ለማረጋገጥ ይጠቅማሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመሰብሰብ ማንነት ማረጋገጫ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: አዎ፣ በመውሰድ ጊዜ መታወቂያ ወይም የማመልከቻ ደረሰኝ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርቴን በፖስታ ማግኘት ይቻላል?
answer: እንደ ቢሮው ፖሊሲ ሊኖር ይችላል፤ የመላኪያ አማራጮችን ያረጋግጡ። (DEMO)

question: የባዮሜትሪክ ፎቶ ከውጭ ስቱዲዮ መመጣት ይችላል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ ፎቶ ከውጭ ይመጣል ነገር ግን የቢሮ መስፈርት መሟላት አለበት። (DEMO)

question: ለፓስፖርት ፎቶ መነጽር መልበስ ይፈቀዳል?
answer: እንደ መመሪያ ይለያያል፤ አይኖች ግልጽ እንዲታዩ መሆን አለበት። (DEMO)

question: ሃይማኖታዊ ልብስ/መሸፈኛ ከለበስኩ ፎቶ ይቀበላሉ?
answer: ሊፈቀድ ይችላል፣ ነገር ግን ፊት ግልጽ መታየት እና መለያ ምርመራ እንዳይከለክል መሆን አለበት። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ቁጥር ምን ይጠቅማል?
answer: ለጉዞ ሰነድ ማረጋገጫ፣ ቪዛ መጠየቂያ እና የአውሮፕላን ቅጥያ ሂደቶች ላይ ይጠቅማል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ውስጥ ያለው መረጃ እንዲረጋገጥ ምን ልፈትሽ?
answer: ስም፣ የትውልድ ቀን፣ ፆታ፣ ቁጥር እና የማብቂያ ቀን ትክክል መሆኑን ይፈትሹ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ከተቀበልኩ በኋላ ስህተት ካገኘሁ ምን አድርግ?
answer: በአጭር ጊዜ ውስጥ ቢሮውን በማነጋገር የማስተካከያ ሂደት ጀምሩ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት የማብቂያ ቀን የት ነው የሚገኝ?
answer: በመለያ ገጽ ላይ (ID page) በግልጽ መልኩ ይጻፋል። (DEMO)

question: ቪዛ ለመጠየቅ ፓስፖርት ምን መስፈርት ይኖረዋል?
answer: እንደ ሀገር መስፈርት ይለያያል፣ ብዙ ጊዜ በቂ ቆይታ ጊዜ እና ባዶ ገጾች ይጠየቃሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመታደስ የድሮው መቀረብ አለበት?
answer: አዎ፣ አብዛኛውን ጊዜ የቀድሞው ፓስፖርት መቅረብ ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: የሚያገለግል ፓስፖርት ማይኖር ከሆነ መታደስ ይቻላል?
answer: እንደ ጉዳዩ በፖሊስ ሪፖርት እና ተጨማሪ ማረጋገጫ ሰነዶች መተካት ሊደረግ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ከመደበኛ በተጨማሪ ሰነዶች ሊጠየቁ ይችላሉ?
answer: አዎ፣ እንደ ጉዳይ ዓይነት የተጨማሪ ማስረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት አገልግሎት ቀናት/ሰዓት እንዴት አውቃለሁ?
answer: በኦፊሴላዊ ማስታወቂያ ወይም በቢሮው ስልክ በመጠየቅ መረጃ ይገኛል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመጠየቅ የእድሜ ገደብ አለ?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ የእድሜ ገደብ የለም፣ ነገር ግን ለአነስተኛ ዕድሜ የወላጅ ሂደት ይኖራል። (DEMO)

question: የአነስተኛ ዕድሜ ልጅ ብቻውን መቀጠር ይቻላል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አይቻልም፤ ወላጅ/አሳዳጊ መገኘት ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ከጠፋ በኋላ አዲስ ቁጥር ይሰጣል?
answer: አዎ፣ የተተካ ፓስፖርት አዲስ መለያ ቁጥር ሊኖረው ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የጠፋ ፓስፖርት ካገኘሁ በኋላ ምን አድርግ?
answer: ቢሮውን ወይም ፖሊስን ያሳውቁ እና የተሰጠውን መመሪያ ይከተሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ተመሳሳይ በመተግበር ለመጠየቅ ይከለክላል?
answer: ማጭበርበር ሙከራ በህግ ይከለክላል እና ክስ ሊያመጣ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማረጋገጫ ኮፒ ማቅረብ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: አዎ፣ ብዙ ጊዜ ኮፒዎች ይጠየቃሉ፣ ነገር ግን መጀመሪያ ሰነድ ደግሞ ማሳየት ይኖርብዎታል። (DEMO)

question: ሰነዶች ትርጉም/ማረጋገጫ ያስፈልጋሉ?
answer: እንደ ሰነዱ ቋንቋ እና መስፈርት ህጋዊ ትርጉም ወይም ኖታሪ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት የሚያገኙበት ቦታ በክልል ይለያያል?
answer: አዎ፣ እንደ ክልል/ከተማ የአገልግሎት ቢሮዎች ሊለያዩ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ለውጭ ጉዞ ቅድሚያ ማስረጃ ምን ሊሆን ይችላል?
answer: የአውሮፕላን ቲኬት፣ የህክምና ማስረጃ፣ የትምህርት/ስራ ጥሪ ደብዳቤ ወዘተ ሊሆን ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ባዮሜትሪክ መረጃዬ ወደ ሌላ አገር ይተላለፋል?
answer: በመሠረቱ ለመለያ ደህንነት ይጠቅማል፤ የመረጃ ማስተዳደር ፖሊሲ እንደ ህግ ይመራል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመተካት ስንት ጊዜ ይወስዳል?
answer: የመተካት ሂደት እንደ ምክንያት እና ማጣሪያ ብዛት ሊረዝም ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የተበላሸ ፓስፖርት ተቀባይነት የለውም ብለው ከአየር ማረፊያ መመለስ ይቻላል?
answer: አዎ፣ ከፍተኛ ጉዳት ካለ አገልግሎት ሊከለክል ይችላል፤ ቅድሚያ ይተኩ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መለያ ገጽ ላይ ፎቶ ካልተመሳሰለ ምን ይደረጋል?
answer: በጉዞ ላይ ችግኝ ሊፈጥር ይችላል፤ ከቢሮ ጋር ማስተካከል ይመከራል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ማደስ ሲደረግ ቪዛዎቼ ምን ይሆናሉ?
answer: ቪዛዎች በአሮጌው ፓስፖርት ላይ ሊቀሩ ይችላሉ፤ ጉዞ ላይ ሁለቱንም መያዝ ሊያስፈልግ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መውጣት ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ እና ለእንደገና መታደስ ሂደት ይለያያል?
answer: መሠረታዊ ደረጃዎች ተመሳሳይ ሊሆኑ ይችላሉ፣ ነገር ግን የድሮ ፓስፖርት እና ታሪክ ማረጋገጫ ሊጨምር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመውጣት የንብረት ሰነድ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: በአብዛኛው አያስፈልግም፤ ዋናው መለያ ማረጋገጫ እና የክፍያ ማስረጃ ነው። (DEMO)

question: የወንጀል መዝገብ መረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል?
answer: እንደ ህግ እና ማጣሪያ ፍላጎት ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ተማሪ ነኝ፣ ልዩ ቅናሽ አለ?
answer: ቅናሽ ካለ በመንግስት መመሪያ ይገለጻል፤ ኦፊሴላዊ መረጃ ይፈልጉ። (DEMO)

question: የክፍያ ደረሰኝ ካጠፋሁ ምን አድርግ?
answer: ከባንክ/የክፍያ ቻናል ቅጂ ማግኘት ወይም ቢሮውን ማነጋገር ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ባንክ ክፍያ ሳላደርግ ማመልከቻ ማስገባት እችላለሁ?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ ክፍያ በመጀመሪያ ይጠየቃል፤ የቢሮ ደንብ ይመልከቱ። (DEMO)

question: በኢሚግሬሽን ቢሮ ላይ መስመር ብዙ ከሆነ ምን ልሥራ?
answer: ቀጠሮ ማስያዝ ወይም የሰዓት እና የቀን ትክክለኛ እቅድ ማድረግ ይረዳል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት አገልግሎት የውስጥ አገር ወይም የውጭ አገር ልዩ መስፈርት አለው?
answer: መሠረታዊ መስፈርቶች ተመሳሳይ ሊሆኑ ይችላሉ፣ ግን በኤምባሲ የማቅረብ ሂደት ሊጨምር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ኤምባሲ ላይ ማመልከት ሲሆን ባዮሜትሪክ የት ይወሰዳል?
answer: በኤምባሲ/ኮንሱላት ባለው የመመዝገቢያ መድረክ ላይ ይወሰዳል። (DEMO)

question: በውጭ አገር የጠፋ ፓስፖርት መተካት ይቻላል?
answer: አዎ፣ በፖሊስ ሪፖርት እና በኤምባሲ/ኮንሱላት ሂደት መተካት ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: ጊዜያዊ የጉዞ ሰነድ ከተሰጠ በኋላ ፓስፖርት ማመልከት አለብኝ?
answer: አዎ፣ ጊዜያዊ ሰነድ ለአንድ ጉዞ ብቻ ሊሆን ይችላል፤ ቋሚ ፓስፖርት ለማግኘት የተለመደ ሂደት ይከተላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ተይዞ ለቪዛ ቢሄድ እኔ እንዴት እጓዛለሁ?
answer: ቪዛ ሂደት ሲኖር ፓስፖርት በሚቆይበት ጊዜ ሌላ ጉዞ ማድረግ ሊከብድ ይችላል፤ ቅድሚያ ይንገሩ። (DEMO)

question: ለፓስፖርት ቅድሚያ አገልግሎት የሚጠየቅ ሰነድ ምን ሊሆን ይችላል?
answer: የአስቸኳይ ሁኔታ ማስረጃ (ህክምና ደብዳቤ፣ ትምህርት/ስራ ጥሪ፣ ቲኬት) ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ስሜን ከቀየርሁ የድሮ ፓስፖርት ልጠቀም እችላለሁ?
answer: ስም ከተቀየረ መረጃ መመሳሰል ያስፈልጋል፤ ብዙ ጊዜ መተካት/ማስተካከል ይመከራል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ላይ የጾታ መረጃ ማስተካከል ይቻላል?
answer: እንደ ህግ የሚያስፈልጉ ማረጋገጫ ሰነዶች ካሉ ማስተካከል ሊቻል ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት የማመልከቻ መረጃ ከሰጠሁ በኋላ መቀየር እችላለሁ?
answer: እንደ ሂደቱ ደረጃ ሊቻል ይችላል፤ ቢሮውን በፍጥነት ያነጋግሩ። (DEMO)

question: ማመልከቻ ላይ የተሳሳተ የትውልድ ቀን ቢጻፍ ምን ይሆናል?
answer: ሊታቀቅ ወይም ለማስተካከያ ሊመለስ ይችላል፤ ትክክለኛ ማስረጃ ያቅርቡ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት እየሰራ ሳለ ተጨማሪ ሰነድ ካስፈለገ እንዴት እነገራለሁ?
answer: በስልክ/SMS/ኢሜይል ማሳወቂያ ወይም በማመልከቻ ሁኔታ ላይ መልዕክት ሊታይ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ከባዮሜትሪክ በኋላ ማመልከቻዬ ሊቆም ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ ካልተሟሉ ሰነዶች ወይም የማረጋገጫ ጉድለት ካለ ሊቆም ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ሂደት ላይ የደላላ አገልግሎት መጠቀም ይመከራል?
answer: የህጋዊ ሂደትን በቀጥታ መከተል ይመከራል፤ ማጭበርበር እና ስጋቶችን ይቆጠቡ። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማብቂያ ቀን ቅርብ ከሆነ ቪዛ ሊከለክል ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ ብዙ አገሮች የተወሰነ ቆይታ ጊዜ ያስፈልጋል ብለው ሊከለክሉ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት በስራ ላይ ሳለ ሌላ ሀገር ቪዛ መጠየቅ እችላለሁ?
answer: ፓስፖርት ዋና ሰነድ ስለሆነ አብዛኛውን ጊዜ እጅዎ ላይ መሆን ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማመልከቻ ከተሳካ በኋላ መሰረዝ እችላለሁ?
answer: እንደ ፖሊሲ ሊቻል ይችላል፣ ግን ክፍያ መመለስ ብዙ ጊዜ አይኖርም። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት እቃዬ በሌላ ስም ተገኝቷል ብለው ካሉ ምን አድርግ?
answer: ቢሮውን በቀጥታ ያነጋግሩ እና የማንነት ማረጋገጫ ሰነዶች ያቅርቡ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት የሚያወጣ ቢሮ ስም እና አድራሻ እንዴት አገኛለሁ?
answer: በኦፊሴላዊ ድረ-ገጽ ወይም በመረጃ መስመር በመጠየቅ መረጃ ይገኛል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመውጣት የትውልድ ሰርቲፊኬት ካልኖረ ምን ይሆናል?
answer: በምትኩ የመንግስት መታወቂያ ወይም ሌሎች ህጋዊ የማንነት ማረጋገጫዎች ሊጠየቁ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ስለ ፓስፖርት ሂደት ከቢሮ ጋር ለመነጋገር የት እጠራ?
answer: የቢሮውን የደንበኛ አገልግሎት መስመር/መገናኛ መረጃ በኦፊሴላዊ ማስታወቂያ ይፈልጉ። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት መረጃ ላይ የሚጠቅሙ ተለመዱ ቃላት ምን ናቸው?
answer: ሪፈረንስ ቁጥር፣ ባዮሜትሪክ፣ መታደስ፣ መተካት፣ ቆይታ ጊዜ ወዘተ ናቸው። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሲወጣ በራሱ ስር የቤተሰብ መረጃ ይካተታል?
answer: እንደ አይነቱ ሊለያይ ይችላል፣ ብዙ ጊዜ እያንዳንዱ ሰው የራሱ ፓስፖርት ይኖረዋል። (DEMO)

question: ለህፃን ፓስፖርት የተጠቃሚ ልዩ ቆይታ ጊዜ አለ?
answer: እንደ መመሪያ ይለያያል፤ አነስተኛ ዕድሜ ፓስፖርት አነስተኛ ቆይታ ሊኖረው ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መተካት ሲደረግ የባዮሜትሪክ መደገም ያስፈልጋል?
answer: አብዛኛውን ጊዜ አዲስ ፓስፖርት ሲወጣ ባዮሜትሪክ ደግሞ ሊወሰድ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት መከላከያ መንገዶች ምን ናቸው?
answer: ፓስፖርትን በደህንነት መያዝ፣ ኮፒ በተለየ ቦታ መቆየት እና ከማጠፋት መጠንቀቅ ይረዳል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ኮፒ በስልክ ማስቀመጥ ይመከራል?
answer: እንደ ጥንቃቄ ሊረዳ ይችላል፣ ነገር ግን የግል መረጃ ደህንነት ይጠብቁ። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ጥራት የተሻለ እንዲሆን ምን እንደምጠብቅ?
answer: ሰነዶችን ትክክል መሙላት፣ የፎቶ መስፈርት መከተል እና መረጃ ሁሉን ማረጋገጥ ይረዳል። (DEMO)

question: ምን ዓይነት ነገር ማመልከቻ እንዲዘገይ ያደርጋል?
answer: ያልተሟሉ ሰነዶች፣ የተሳሳተ መረጃ፣ የፎቶ ችግኝ፣ እና የማጣሪያ ጉዳዮች ሊዘግዩ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሲወጣ የማንነት ዳታ በቺፕ ውስጥ ይገባል?
answer: ኢ-ፓስፖርት ከሆነ የባዮሜትሪክ መረጃ ቺፕ ውስጥ ሊያካትት ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ኢ-ፓስፖርት ቺፕ ቢበላሽ ምን ይደረጋል?
answer: ቢሮውን በማነጋገር የመተካት ወይም የማስተካከያ ሂደት ሊጀምር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ገጾች ቢቀጠቀጡ ችግኝ ይፈጥራል?
answer: አዎ፣ ማህተም/ቪዛ ያለባቸው ገጾች ቢጎዱ ተቀባይነት ሊከለክል ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ማህተም ማስተካከል ወይም መጻፍ ይፈቀዳል?
answer: አይፈቀድም፤ ማንኛውም ማሻሻያ መተካት ያስፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ስም ላቲን አጻጻፍ እንዴት ይመረጣል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ ከኦፊሴላዊ ሰነዶች የተለመደ ስፔሊንግ ይወሰዳል፤ ከተለያየ ግን ማስረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ማረጋገጫ ሰነድ በፍርድ ቤት ሊጠቅም ይችላል?
answer: ፓስፖርት ኦፊሴላዊ መለያ ስለሆነ በብዙ ህጋዊ ሂደቶች ላይ ይጠቅማል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሲታደስ የድሮ መረጃ ይቀየራል?
answer: አዲሱ ፓስፖርት አዲስ ቀናት/መለያ ሊኖረው ይችላል፤ ዋና መለያ መረጃ ግን እንደ ማስረጃ ይቀጥላል። (DEMO)

question: ከልጄ ጋር የምጓዝ ከሆነ ተጨማሪ ሰነድ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: አንዳንድ አገሮች የወላጅ ፈቃድ ደብዳቤ ወይም የቤተሰብ ማረጋገጫ ሊጠይቁ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: አንድ ወላጅ ብቻ ከህፃን ጋር ቢጓዝ ምን ይጠየቃል?
answer: የሌላው ወላጅ ፈቃድ ወይም የህጋዊ ተጠሪነት ማስረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት በተለያዩ ሀገሮች ላይ የመግባት መብት ይሰጣል?
answer: ፓስፖርት የመለያ ሰነድ ነው፤ መግባት ብዙ ጊዜ ቪዛ/የጉዞ ፈቃድ ይፈልጋል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ማለት ቪዛ ማለት ነው?
answer: አይደለም፤ ፓስፖርት መለያ ሰነድ ነው፣ ቪዛ ግን የመግባት/መቆየት ፈቃድ ነው። (DEMO)

question: የማመልከቻ ሁኔታ “Under Review” ብሎ ካሳየ ምን ማለት ነው?
answer: ሰነዶችና መረጃዎች እየተረጋገጡ እንዳሉ ይጠቁማል። (DEMO)

question: የማመልከቻ ሁኔታ “Rejected” ብሎ ካሳየ ምን ማለት ነው?
answer: ማመልከቻው እንደ መመሪያ አልተሟላም ማለት ነው፤ ምክንያቱ ይገለጻል። (DEMO)

question: የማመልከቻ ሁኔታ “Ready for Collection” ብሎ ካሳየ ምን ማለት ነው?
answer: ፓስፖርቱ ተዘጋጅቶ ለመውሰድ ዝግጁ መሆኑን ይጠቁማል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መውሰድ ሲሆን የቀጠሮ ደረሰኝ ያስፈልጋል?
answer: አብዛኛውን ጊዜ የማመልከቻ ደረሰኝ/ሪፈረንስ ቁጥር መያዝ ይጠቅማል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ቆይታ ጊዜ ከተለያዩ አይነቶች ጋር ይለያያል?
answer: አዎ፣ እንደ አመልካች ምድብ ወይም እንደ አገልግሎት ስርዓት ሊለያይ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት አገልግሎት የሚሰጥበት ቦታ ለማረጋገጥ ምን አድርግ?
answer: ኦፊሴላዊ መረጃ ከድረ-ገጽ ወይም በቢሮ ስልክ ይያዙ። (DEMO)

question: ለፓስፖርት መውጣት የተለያዩ ምድቦች አሉ?
answer: አዎ፣ መደበኛ፣ አገልግሎት እና ዲፕሎማቲክ እንደሚሉ ምድቦች ሊኖሩ ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ ፊርማ መስጠት ግዴታ ነው?
answer: አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ፊርማ ይፈለጋል፣ ነገር ግን ለህፃናት የተለየ መመሪያ ሊኖር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ህፃናት ፓስፖርት ላይ ፊርማ ይፈለጋል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አይፈለግም ወይም በወላጅ/አሳዳጊ ፊርማ ሊተካ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በስልክ የተላከ SMS ማሳወቂያ ካልደረሰ ምን አድርግ?
answer: በሪፈረንስ ቁጥር ሁኔታ ይመልከቱ ወይም የደንበኛ አገልግሎትን ያነጋግሩ። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ሂደት ላይ የማንነት ማረጋገጫ ከማን ይቀርባል?
answer: ከመንግስት የተሰጠ መታወቂያ/ህጋዊ ሰነዶች በመሠረት ይረጋገጣል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ማስተካከል በምን ሁኔታ ይፈለጋል?
answer: ስም፣ የትውልድ ቀን፣ ፆታ ወይም ሌሎች መረጃዎች ስህተት ካለ ማስተካከል ይፈለጋል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መተካት እና መታደስ ልዩነታቸው ምንድነው?
answer: መታደስ በብዛት ለጊዜ ማብቂያ ነው፤ መተካት ግን ጠፍቶ/ተበላሽቶ/መረጃ ሲቀየር ይሆናል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት ጉዳይ ላይ መረጃ ለማወቅ በቢሮ ላይ ማን ልጠይቅ?
answer: የደንበኛ አገልግሎት ወይም የመረጃ መስኮት ቦታ ይረዳዎታል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት በህግ ሊያዝ ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ በህጋዊ ችግኝ ወይም በፍርድ ቤት ውሳኔ መሰረት ሊገደብ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ሂደት ላይ ስለ ግል መረጃ መጠበቅ ምን ልጠንቀቅ?
answer: መረጃዎን ለማያስፈልጋቸው ሰዎች አታጋሩ፣ ኦፊሴላዊ ቻናሎችን ብቻ ይጠቀሙ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ሲጠፋ የፖሊስ ሪፖርት ለምን ያስፈልጋል?
answer: የጠፋው መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ እና አጠቃቀም እንዳይቀጥል ለመቆጣጠር ይጠቅማል። (DEMO)

question: በፓስፖርት ላይ የማንነት መረጃ ተመሳሳይ ካልሆነ ባንክ/ቪዛ ሊከለክል ይችላል?
answer: አዎ፣ ስም እና መለያ መረጃ መመሳሰል አስፈላጊ ነው። (DEMO)

question: የመንግስት ስራ ሰራተኛ ለፓስፖርት ልዩ አገልግሎት አለ?
answer: እንደ መመሪያ ሊኖር ይችላል፤ በኦፊሴላዊ መረጃ ያረጋግጡ። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለመውጣት የአድራሻ ማረጋገጫ ይጠየቃል?
answer: አንዳንድ ጊዜ የመኖሪያ ማረጋገጫ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል፣ ነገር ግን በአብዛኛው መታወቂያ በቂ ይሆናል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት ለማመልከት ማንኛውም የጤና ምርመራ ይፈለጋል?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ አይፈለግም፣ ነገር ግን ልዩ አገልግሎት ሲጠየቅ ማስረጃ ሊኖር ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: ፓስፖርት መታደስ ሲደረግ የክፍያ መጠን ይቀየራል?
answer: አዎ፣ እንደ ክፍያ መመሪያ እና አገልግሎት ፍጥነት መጠኑ ሊለያይ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: መረጃ ማረጋገጫ ሲደረግ የቤተሰብ መረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል?
answer: አንዳንድ ጊዜ ለማንነት ማረጋገጫ ተጨማሪ መረጃ ሊጠየቅ ይችላል። (DEMO)

question: የፓስፖርት መውጣት ካልተቻለ የመብት መለያያት አለ?
answer: እንደ ህግ መመሪያ ቅሬታ ማቅረብ ወይም የግልጽ ምክንያት መጠየቅ ይቻላል። (DEMO)

question: እስከ መጨረሻው እንደሚያስፈልጉ የፓስፖርት ጥያቄዎች ምን ናቸው?
answer: ብዙ ጊዜ ስለ ሰነዶች፣ ክፍያ፣ ቀጠሮ፣ ባዮሜትሪክ፣ ሁኔታ ክትትል እና መተካት/መታደስ ይመራሉ። (DEMO)

question: What documents are required to apply for a passport?
answer: You need a completed application form, national ID or birth certificate, recent passport-size photos, and proof of payment. (DEMO)

question: Where can I apply for a passport?
answer: You can apply at the main immigration office or designated regional passport offices. (DEMO)

question: How much does a passport cost?
answer: The passport fee depends on the type and processing speed. Please check the official fee schedule. (DEMO)

question: How long does it take to get a passport?
answer: Normal processing takes several weeks, while expedited services are faster. (DEMO)

question: Can I apply for a passport online?
answer: Some steps may be completed online, but physical presence is required for biometrics. (DEMO)

question: What is the validity period of a passport?
answer: Passports are usually valid for 5 or 10 years depending on applicant category. (DEMO)

question: How do I renew an expired passport?
answer: You must submit the old passport, renewal form, photos, and pay the renewal fee. (DEMO)

question: Can I renew my passport before it expires?
answer: Yes, early renewal is allowed within a specified period before expiry. (DEMO)

question: What should I do if my passport is lost?
answer: Report the loss immediately and apply for a replacement with a police report. (DEMO)

question: What should I do if my passport is damaged?
answer: Submit the damaged passport with an explanation letter and apply for replacement. (DEMO)

question: Can children apply for passports?
answer: Yes, minors can apply with parental consent and guardian documents. (DEMO)

question: What documents are required for a child passport?
answer: Birth certificate, parent IDs, consent letter, and photos are required. (DEMO)

question: Do both parents need to be present for a child passport?
answer: Usually yes, unless legal documents state otherwise. (DEMO)

question: Can a guardian apply on behalf of a minor?
answer: Yes, with valid guardianship documents. (DEMO)

question: What is biometric enrollment?
answer: It includes capturing fingerprints, photo, and signature at the passport office. (DEMO)

question: Is biometric data mandatory?
answer: Yes, biometric data is required for passport issuance. (DEMO)

question: Can elderly applicants skip biometrics?
answer: Certain exemptions may apply based on age or health conditions. (DEMO)

question: What type of photos are required for passport application?
answer: Recent passport-size photos with a white background are required. (DEMO)

question: Can I smile in my passport photo?
answer: No, a neutral facial expression is required. (DEMO)

question: What happens if my application is rejected?
answer: You will be informed of the reason and advised on corrective steps. (DEMO)

question: Can I track my passport application status?
answer: Yes, you can track status using the reference number provided. (DEMO)

question: What is an expedited passport service?
answer: It is a faster processing option available for additional fees. (DEMO)

question: Who is eligible for expedited passport processing?
answer: Applicants with urgent travel needs may qualify. (DEMO)

question: Can I change my name on my passport?
answer: Yes, with legal proof such as a court order or marriage certificate. (DEMO)

question: How do I correct errors on my passport?
answer: Apply for correction with supporting documents showing the error. (DEMO)

question: Is passport replacement free if the error is not mine?
answer: Corrections due to official error may be free of charge. (DEMO)

question: Can I travel if my passport is about to expire?
answer: Most countries require at least six months validity. (DEMO)

question: What should I do if my passport expires abroad?
answer: Contact the nearest embassy or consulate for assistance. (DEMO)

question: Can I hold two passports?
answer: Dual passports are only allowed under specific legal conditions. (DEMO)

question: What is a machine-readable passport?
answer: It is a passport with encoded data readable by scanners. (DEMO)

question: What is an e-passport?
answer: An electronic passport contains a biometric chip for security. (DEMO)

question: Is an e-passport mandatory?
answer: E-passports are becoming standard but availability may vary. (DEMO)

question: Can I apply for a passport while abroad?
answer: Yes, through embassies or consulates. (DEMO)

question: How long does overseas passport processing take?
answer: It may take longer than domestic processing. (DEMO)

question: What payment methods are accepted for passport fees?
answer: Payments can be made via bank deposit or approved payment channels. (DEMO)

question: Is the passport fee refundable?
answer: Passport fees are generally non-refundable. (DEMO)

question: What is a temporary travel document?
answer: It is issued for emergency travel when a passport is unavailable. (DEMO)

question: Who can get a temporary travel document?
answer: Citizens with urgent travel needs may qualify. (DEMO)

question: Can I update my address on my passport?
answer: Address updates usually do not require passport reissue. (DEMO)

question: Does passport issuance require an appointment?
answer: Appointments may be required depending on office capacity. (DEMO)

question: How do I book a passport appointment?
answer: Appointments can be booked online or at the service office. (DEMO)

question: What should I bring on my appointment day?
answer: Original documents, copies, photos, and payment receipt. (DEMO)

question: Can someone else collect my passport for me?
answer: Collection by proxy may be allowed with authorization. (DEMO)

question: How will I be notified when my passport is ready?
answer: You may receive SMS or email notification. (DEMO)

question: What if I miss my passport appointment?
answer: You may need to reschedule or rebook a new appointment. (DEMO)

question: Can pregnant women get priority service?
answer: Priority may be given based on medical need. (DEMO)

question: Are persons with disabilities given special support?
answer: Yes, assistance and priority service may be provided. (DEMO)

question: What languages are supported in passport services?
answer: Services are usually provided in major national languages. (DEMO)

question: Can refugees apply for national passports?
answer: Refugees must follow specific legal procedures. (DEMO)

question: What is a diplomatic passport?
answer: It is issued to government officials for official travel. (DEMO)

question: What is a service passport?
answer: It is issued for official government duties abroad. (DEMO)

question: Who qualifies for a diplomatic passport?
answer: High-level officials and diplomats qualify. (DEMO)

question: Can ordinary citizens apply for diplomatic passports?
answer: No, eligibility is restricted by law. (DEMO)

question: How many blank pages should a passport have?
answer: At least two blank pages are recommended for travel. (DEMO)

question: Can I add extra pages to my passport?
answer: Extra pages are not added; renewal is required. (DEMO)

question: What happens to my old passport after renewal?
answer: It may be returned with cancellation marks. (DEMO)

question: Can I keep my old passport after renewal?
answer: Yes, but it will be invalid for travel. (DEMO)

question: What is the passport application reference number?
answer: It is a unique number used to track your application. (DEMO)

question: Is fingerprint data stored securely?
answer: Yes, biometric data is stored under strict security rules. (DEMO)

question: Can my passport be revoked?
answer: Yes, under certain legal circumstances. (DEMO)

question: What laws govern passport issuance?
answer: Passport services are governed by national immigration laws. (DEMO)

question: Where can I get official passport information?
answer: From the official immigration authority website or offices. (DEMO)

question: Who should I contact for passport complaints?
answer: Contact the customer service desk or complaint office. (DEMO)

question: Can I apply for a passport with an expired ID?
answer: Valid identification is required for application. (DEMO)

question: Is an interview required for passport application?
answer: Some applicants may be required to attend an interview. (DEMO)

question: What security checks are done before issuing a passport?
answer: Identity verification and background checks are performed. (DEMO)

question: Can I update my marital status on my passport?
answer: Marital status changes require legal proof. (DEMO)

question: What should I do if my passport is stolen abroad?
answer: Report to local police and contact your embassy immediately. (DEMO)

question: Can I apply for a passport if I owe legal fines?
answer: Outstanding legal issues may affect eligibility. (DEMO)

question: How early should I apply before traveling?
answer: Apply several months before your planned travel date. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii gaafachuuf sanadoonni maalii barbaachisu?
answer: Fooramii iyyataa guutuu, ID mootummaa ykn ragaa dhalootaa, suuraa paaspoortii dhiyeenyaan kaafame, fi ragaa kaffaltii dhiyeessuun barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii eessa irratti iyyachuu danda’a?
answer: Waajjira Imigireeshinii mootummaa keessaa isa guddaa ykn waajjira paaspoortii naannoo/ulaagaaleen itti ramadaman irratti iyyachuu ni dandeessa. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii baasuun gatii hangamii qaba?
answer: Gatiin isaa gosa paaspoortii fi saffisa tajaajilaa irratti hundaa’a; tarree kaffaltii mootummaa irraa mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii argachuuf yeroo hangamii fudhata?
answer: Tajaajilli idile torbanoota hedduu fudhachuu danda’a; tajaajilli ariifachiisaa immoo yeroo gabaabaa keessatti xumurama. (DEMO)

question: Onlaayinii irratti paaspoortii iyyachuu danda’a?
answer: Tarkaanfii muraasni onlaayinii ta’uu danda’a; garuu baayomeetirii (fingerprint/suuraa) kennuuf qaamaan argamuu barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin waggaa meeqaaf tajaajila?
answer: Yeroon hojii isaa yeroo baay’ee waggaa 5 ykn 10 ta’uu danda’a; irratti iyyattee akkaataa ramaddii irratti hundaa’a. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii xumurame (expire) akkamitti haaromsa?
answer: Paaspoortii duraanii, fooramii haaromsaa, suuraa, fi ragaa kaffaltii waliin dhiyeessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii xumuruun dura haaromsuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Eeyyee; yeroo murtaa’e dura haaromsiin ni eeyyamama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin yoo na bade maal godha?
answer: Battalumatti gabaasa poolisii godhi, booda ragaa gabaasaa waliin bakka bu’iinsa (replacement) iyyadhu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin yoo miidhame maal godha?
answer: Paaspoortii miidhame sana, ibsa gabaabaa (letter) fi sanadoota barbaachisan waliin dhiyeessuun bakka bu’iinsa iyyadhu. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imni paaspoortii iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; garuu eeyyama maatii (warraa/abbaa fi haadha) fi sanadoota daa’imaaf barbaachisan qabaachuu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imaaf paaspoortii iyyachuuf sanadoonni maalii?
answer: Ragaa dhalootaa, ID warraa, xalayaa eeyyamaa, suuraa, fi ragaa kaffaltii barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imaaf paaspoortii irratti abbaa fi haati lamaan argamuu qabu?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee eeyyee; yoo hin danda’amne sanada seeraa (murtii mana murtii/fkn) dhiyeessuu danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Abbaa seeraa/abbaa guddisaa daa’ima bakka bu’ee iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; sanada mootummaa irraa mirkaneessa abbaa guddisummaa/guardianship qabaachuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Baayomeetirii (biometric) jechuun maalidha?
answer: Mallattoolee eenyummaa kan akka farra barmoo (fingerprint), suuraa dijitaalaa, fi mallattoo (signature) galmeessuu dha. (DEMO)

question: Baayomeetirii kennuun dirqamaa?
answer: Eeyyee; paaspoortii baasuuf baayomeetirii galmeessuun yeroo baay’ee dirqama. (DEMO)

question: Jaarsa/jaartiin baayomeetirii osoo hin kennin ni tajaajilama?
answer: Haala fayyaa ykn umrii irratti hundaa’uun qajeelfamni addaa jiraachuu danda’a; waajjira irraa mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Suuraan paaspoortii akkam ta’uu qaba?
answer: Suuraa haaraa, duubbee adii, ifa walfakkaataa, fuula ifatti mul’atu, fi seera suuraa kan guutu ta’uu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Suuraa paaspoortii irratti kolfachuun ni eeyyamama?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee hin eeyyamamu; fuula tasgabbaa’aa (neutral expression) barbaadu. (DEMO)

question: Iyyanni koo yoo didame maal ta’a?
answer: Sababni ni ibsama; maal akka sirreessu fi akkamitti deebitee iyyattu si qajeelchu. (DEMO)

question: Haala iyyata paaspoortii koo hordofuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; lakkoofsa ragaalee (reference number) fayyadamuun haala isaa ilaalu ni dandeessa. (DEMO)

question: Tajaajilli ariifachiisaa paaspoortii maalidha?
answer: Tajaajila yeroo gabaabduu keessatti xumuramu; yeroo baay’ee kaffaltii dabalataa qaba. (DEMO)

question: Eenyyutu tajaajila ariifachiisaa argachuu danda’a?
answer: Namni dhimma daandii/imaltoota ariifachiisaa qabu ragaa dhiyeesseen ni argata. (DEMO)

question: Maqaa paaspoortii irratti jijjiiruun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Eeyyee; ragaa seeraa akka murtii mana murtii ykn ragaa fuudha/heerumaatiin ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Dogoggora paaspoortii irratti argame akkamitti sirreessa?
answer: Dogoggora agarsiisu sanadoota ragaa waliin iyyata sirreeffamaa (correction) dhiyeessi. (DEMO)

question: Dogoggora mootummaa irraa ta’e yoo ta’e kaffaltiin jiraa?
answer: Yeroo muraasa dogoggora waajjiraa ta’e keessatti kaffaltiin malee sirreessuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin koo yeroon isaa dhiyaate yoo ta’e imaluun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Biyya hedduun ji’a 6 ol yeroo hojii (validity) akka hafu barbaadu; dura mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Ala jiruun paaspoortiin koo yoo xumure maal godha?
answer: Embassy/consulate dhihoo qunnami; qajeelfama isaanii hordofi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii lama qabachuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Haala seeraa murtaa’e keessatti qofa ni danda’ama; qajeelfama biyya keetii ilaali. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin machine-readable jechuun maalidha?
answer: Paaspoortii odeeffannoo koodiin (scanner) dubbifamu qabu jechuudha. (DEMO)

question: E-passport jechuun maalidha?
answer: Paaspoortii ‘chip’ baayomeetirii keessa qabu; nageenya guddisuuf. (DEMO)

question: E-passport dirqamaa moo?
answer: Biyya/waajjira irratti hundaa’uun gara-gara; yeroo baay’ee immoo gara tarsiimoo haaraa ta’aa jira. (DEMO)

question: Ala irraa iyyachuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Eeyyee; embassy ykn consulate keessaatiin iyyachuu ni dandeessa. (DEMO)

question: Ala irraa iyyachuun yeroo hangamii fudhata?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee tajaajila biyya keessaa caalaa dheeraa fudhachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Kaffaltiin paaspoortii akkamitti kaffalama?
answer: Baankii keessatti galii (deposit) gochuu ykn karaa kaffaltii mootummaa eeyyamameen. (DEMO)

question: Kaffaltiin paaspoortii ni deebi’a?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee kaffaltiin hin deebi’u. (DEMO)

question: Sanada imala yeroo gabaabaa (temporary travel document) jechuun maalidha?
answer: Paaspoortiin yeroo hin jirre (bade/miidhame) imala ariifachiisaa irratti tajaajiluuf kan kennamu dha. (DEMO)

question: Eenyutu sanada imala yeroo gabaabaa argata?
answer: Namni imala ariifachiisaa qabu ragaa waliin iyyateen ni argata. (DEMO)

question: Teessoo (address) paaspoortii irratti haaromsuun barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee teessoo jijjiiruun paaspoortii haaraa hin barbaachisu; garuu qajeelfama irraa mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuuf beellama (appointment) qabachuun barbaachisaa?
answer: Waajjira irratti baay’ina tajaajilamtootaa irratti hundaa’uun beellamni barbaachisaa ta’uu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Beellama paaspoortii akkamitti qabata?
answer: Karaa onlaayinii ykn waajjira irratti sirnaan beellama qabachuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Guyyaa beellamaa maal fida?
answer: Sanadoota aslii, kooppii, suuraa, fi ragaa kaffaltii fidi. (DEMO)

question: Namni biraa paaspoortii koo fudhachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Haala muraasa keessatti waraqaa eeyyamaa/authorization waliin ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin koo yeroo qophaa’e akkamitti beeka?
answer: Ergaa SMS/imeeyilii ykn lakkoofsa referenceiin haala isaa ilaaluun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Beellama koo yoo dabarse maal ta’a?
answer: Deebitee beellama haaraa qabachuun ykn yeroo biroo irratti qindeessuun si barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Haati ulfaa tajaajila dursa (priority) ni argatti?
answer: Haala fayyaa irratti hundaa’uun tajaajila dursa kennamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Namoota qaama miidhamtootaaf gargaarsi addaa jiraa?
answer: Eeyyee; deeggarsa fi tajaajila dursa ni kennamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Tajaajilli paaspoortii afaan maaliin kennama?
answer: Afaanota mootummaa/naannoo beekamoo keessatti tajaajilli kennamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Refugee/saddeetummaa qabus paaspoortii biyyaatiif iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Haala seeraa addaa qabaachuu danda’a; qaama dhimmi ilaallatu irraa odeeffannoo argadhu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin diplomatic jechuun maalidha?
answer: Tajaajila mootummaa/diiploomaasii irratti imalan mootummaaaf kan kennamu paaspoortii addaa dha. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin service (tajaajila) jechuun maalidha?
answer: Hojii mootummaa addaa keessatti biyya alaa deemaniif kan kennamu paaspoortii dha. (DEMO)

question: Eenyutu paaspoortii diplomatic argata?
answer: Hoggantoota mootummaa fi diiploomaatoonni ulaagaa guutan ni argatu. (DEMO)

question: Namni mootummaa hin taane diplomatic iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Hin danda’u; ulaagaan isaa seeraan daangeffameera. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii irratti fuula duwwaa meeqa qabaachuun gaarii dha?
answer: Visa fi chaappaaaf (stamp) fuula duwwaa yoo xiqqaate lama qabaachuun ni gorfama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii irratti fuula dabalataa dabaluun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee hin dabalamuu; fuula xumurame yoo ta’e haaromsa barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsaan booda paaspoortii duraanii maal ta’a?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee ‘cancelled’ jechuun mallatteeffamee siif deebi’uu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsaan booda paaspoortii duraanii of harkaa qabaachuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Eeyyee; garuu imaluuf hin fayyadu (akka seeraan hojii keessaa bahe). (DEMO)

question: Lakkoofsi reference iyyataa maal tajaajila?
answer: Iyyata kee hordofuuf lakkoofsa addaa siif kennamu dha. (DEMO)

question: Odeeffannoon fingerprint akka nageenyaan tursiifamaa?
answer: Eeyyee; seera nageenya odeeffannoo jabeessaatiin tursiifama jedhamee fudhatama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin haala seeraan haqamuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; sababoota seeraa muraasa keessatti paaspoortiin haqamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Seerotni paaspoortii kennuuf fayyadan maalii?
answer: Tajaajilli paaspoortii seerota imigireeshinii fi lammummaa biyyattii jalatti hogganama. (DEMO)

question: Odeeffannoo paaspoortii mootummaa sirrii eessaa argadha?
answer: Marsariitii mootummaa/waajjira imigireeshinii irraa ykn waajjira tajaajilaa irratti. (DEMO)

question: Komiin paaspoortii eessaaf dhiyeeffama?
answer: Kutaa tajaajila maamila ykn bakka komii fudhatuutti dhiyeessi. (DEMO)

question: ID koo yeroon isaa darbe yoo ta’e iyyachuu danda’a?
answer: ID hojiirra jiru/valid ta’e barbaachisa; yoo hin jirre dura haaromsuu si barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuun interviewer (gaaffii) qaba?
answer: Namoota muraasaaf yeroo mirkaneessa dabalataa barbaachisu gaafii/warraaqsi ni ta’uu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii kennuun dura mirkaneessi akkamiin gaggeeffama?
answer: Eenummaa mirkaneessu, sakatta’iinsa seeraa/nageenyaa, fi qulqullina sanadootaa ilaaluu ni dabalata. (DEMO)

question: Haala heeruma (marital status) paaspoortii irratti haaromsuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Eeyyee; ragaa heeruma/furriqa (divorce) ykn sanada seeraa waliin ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Ala irratti paaspoortiin yoo na saame/hatame maal godha?
answer: Poolisii biyya sanaatti gabaasi, booda embassy/consulate qunnami. (DEMO)

question: Adabbii seeraa (fines/case) yoo qabaadhe paaspoortii iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Dhimmootni seeraa muraasni ulaagaa irratti dhiibbaa qabaachuu danda’u; waajjira irraa mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Imaaluun dura hangam dursee iyyachuun gaarii?
answer: Iyyanni dheerachuu danda’a; kanaaf ji’oota hedduu dursee iyyachuun ni gorfama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuuf tarkaanfiin jalqabaa maal?
answer: Fooramii guutuu fi sanadoota barbaachisan qopheessuu dha. (DEMO)

question: Fooramiin iyyataa eessaa argama?
answer: Waajjira tajaajilaa irraa ykn karaa onlaayinii (yoo jirate) irraa argamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Fooramii irratti dogoggora yoo godhe maal ta’a?
answer: Sirreessuuf ni qajeelchu; yeroo muraasa keessatti fooramii haaromsee guutuu si barbaachisuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Fooramii irratti bilbila fi imeeyiliin maaliif barbaadama?
answer: Beeksisa (notification), mirkaneessa, fi haala iyyataa sitti himuuf tajaajila. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii fudhachuuf eenyummaa mirkaneessuun barbaachisaa?
answer: Eeyyee; yeroo fudhattu ID/receipt ykn reference number ni gaafatu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii poostaan naaf erguun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Policy waajjiraa irratti hundaa’a; filannoowwan ergaa/collection mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Suuraa baayomeetirii waajjira keessatti kaafama moo studio irraa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee suuraan studio irraa ni dhiyaata; garuu seera suuraa waajjiraa guutuu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Suuraa paaspoortii irratti gilaasii ijaa uffachuun ni eeyyamama?
answer: Qajeelfama irratti hundaa’a; ija ifatti akka mul’atu mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Uffata amantii (head covering) suura keessatti ni eeyyamama?
answer: Eeyyamamuu danda’a; garuu fuulli guutuun ifatti mul’achuu fi mirkaneessa hin gufachiifne ta’uu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Lakkoofsi paaspoortii maal tajaajila?
answer: Visa iyyachuu, tikkeeta imalaa, fi mirkaneessa eenyummaa keessatti barbaachisaa dha. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii argadhee booda maal sakatta’uu qaba?
answer: Maqaa, guyyaa dhalootaa, saala, lakkoofsa paaspoortii, fi guyyaa dhumtii sirrii ta’uu mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii booda dogoggora arge yoo ta’e maal godha?
answer: Yeroo gabaabaa keessatti waajjira qunnami; sirreeffama/correction iyyadhu. (DEMO)

question: Guyyaan dhumtii (expiry) paaspoortii eessa irratti barreeffama?
answer: Fuula eenyummaa (ID page) irratti ifatti ni barreeffama. (DEMO)

question: Visa iyyachuuf paaspoortiin ulaagaa maalii qabaachuu qaba?
answer: Biyya irratti hundaa’a; yeroo hojii gahaa fi fuula duwwaa gahaa qabaachuun ni barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsuuf paaspoortii duraanii dhiyeessuun dirqamaa?
answer: Eeyyee; yeroo baay’ee paaspoortii duraanii dhiyeessuun barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii duraanii yoo hin qabne haaromsuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Haala irratti hundaa’uun gabaasa poolisii fi mirkaneessa dabalataa waliin bakka bu’iinsa iyyachuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Sanadoota dabalataa gaafatamuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; haala iyyataa irratti hundaa’uun mirkaneessa dabalataa ni gaafatama. (DEMO)

question: Sa’aatii fi guyyaa tajaajilaa eessaa beeka?
answer: Beeksisa mootummaa/waajjira irraa ykn bilbila waajjiraa irratti gaafattee ni argatta. (DEMO)

question: Iyyata paaspoortii irratti daangaan umurii jiraa?
answer: Daangaan guddaan hin jiru; garuu daa’imaaf qajeelfamni addaa ni jira. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imni ofumaan beellama deemuu ni danda’a?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee hin danda’u; abbaa/haadha ykn abbaa guddisaa waliin deemuu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Bakka bu’iinsi paaspoortii (replacement) lakkoofsa haaraa qabaataa?
answer: Eeyyee; paaspoortiin bakka bu’iinsa ta’e yeroo baay’ee lakkoofsa addaa haaraa qaba. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii bade booda deebisee argadhe maal godha?
answer: Waajjira/poolisii beeksisi; qajeelfama isaanii hordofi. (DEMO)

question: Iyyata sobaa/fakkeessuun paaspoortii argachuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Seeraan dhoorkamaa dha; adabbii fi dhimmi seeraa irratti si geessuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Koophiyaa sanadoota paaspoortii dhiyeessuun ni barbaachisaa?
answer: Eeyyee; koophiyaa ni gaafatu, garuu sanada aslii agarsiisuu dabalata. (DEMO)

question: Sanadoonni hiika (translation) ykn notary barbaadu?
answer: Afaan sanadaa fi seera waajjiraa irratti hundaa’uun hiika seeraa/notary ni gaafachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Bakka tajaajilli kenname naannoo keessatti ni jijjiiramaa?
answer: Eeyyee; naannoo/ magaalaa irratti hundaa’uun waajjirri tajaajila ni garaagara. (DEMO)

question: Tajaajila ariifachiisaaf ragaan “urgency” maal ta’uu danda’a?
answer: Tikkeeta imalaa, xalayaa hospitaalaa, xalayaa barnoota hojii/affeerraa, fi kkf ta’uu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Odeeffannoon baayomeetirii gara biyya biraatti darbama?
answer: Qajeelfama tursiisaa odeeffannoo mootummaa irratti hundaa’a; yeroo baay’ee tajaajila nageenya eenyummaa irratti fayyada. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii bakka bu’iinsa iyyachuun yeroo hangamii fudhata?
answer: Sababa fi sakatta’iinsa irratti hundaa’uun dheeraa fudhachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii miidhameen airport irraa deebisamuu danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; miidhaan cimaa yoo jiraate tajaajilli imalaa ni gufata; dura bakka bu’iinsa gochuu gaarii dha. (DEMO)

question: Suuraan paaspoortii fuula eenyummaa irratti ana hin fakkaatu yoo ta’e maal ta’a?
answer: Imala irratti rakkoo uuma; waajjira waliin sirreeffama/replace gochuu barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsaan booda visa duraanii maal ta’a?
answer: Visa duraanii paaspoortii moofa irratti turuu danda’a; yeroo imalu paaspoortii haaraa fi moofa waliin qabachuun ni barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Iyyata yeroo jalqabaatiif fi haaromsaaf adeemsi ni adda?
answer: Bu’uuraan walfakkaata; garuu haaromsa keessatti paaspoortii duraanii fi mirkaneessa dabalataa ni dabalata. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuuf ragaa qabeenyaa (property) barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee miti; bu’uuraan eenyummaa mirkaneessaa fi ragaa kaffaltii dha. (DEMO)

question: Ragaan yakkaa (criminal record) ni gaafama?
answer: Haala seeraa fi sakatta’iinsa irratti hundaa’uun ni gaafachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Ani barataa dha; hir’ina kaffaltii (discount) jiraa?
answer: Yoo jiraate qajeelfama mootummaa keessatti ibsama; odeeffannoo mootummaa irraa mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Receipt kaffaltii yoo na bade maal godha?
answer: Baankii/kanal kaffaltii irraa copy argachuu ykn waajjira qunnachuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Kaffaltii osoo hin raawwachin iyyata galchuu ni danda’a?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee kaffaltiin dura barbaachisa; seera waajjiraa ilaali. (DEMO)

question: Waajjira irratti sarara dheerinaan yoo jiraate maal gorsa?
answer: Beellama qabachuun, yeroo gad-aanaa filachuun, fi sanadoota hunda dursee qopheessuun ni gargaara. (DEMO)

question: Iyyanni biyya keessaa fi ala irratti ulaagaan ni garaagara?
answer: Bu’uuraan walfakkaata; garuu adeemsi embassy keessatti dabalata qabaachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Ala iyyachuun baayomeetirii eessa irratti kennama?
answer: Embassy/consulate keessatti bakka galmee baayomeetirii irratti ni kennama. (DEMO)

question: Ala jiraachuun paaspoortii bade bakka bu’u ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; gabaasa poolisii fi adeemsa embassy/consulateen ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Temporary travel document booda paaspoortii idilee iyyachuun barbaachisaa?
answer: Eeyyee; kan yeroo muraasaaf tajaajilu; paaspoortii idilee argachuuf adeemsa idilee hordofuu qabda. (DEMO)

question: Visaaf paaspoortiin yeroo dheeraa waajjira/embassy bira turuun maal miidha?
answer: Yeroo paaspoortiin harkaa si hin jirre imala biraa gochuun rakkisaa ta’a; hojii kee dursee qindeessi. (DEMO)

question: Priority service argachuuf ragaan akkam ta’uu qaba?
answer: Ragaa ariifachiisummaa (hospitaal, hojii/barnoota affeerraa, tikkeeta) dhiyeessuu dandeessa. (DEMO)

question: Maqaa jijjiirameen paaspoortii moofa itti fufuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Rakkoo walsimsiisaa uuma; yeroo baay’ee sirreeffama/bakka bu’iinsa gochuu barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Saala (gender) paaspoortii irratti sirreessuun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Seera irratti hundaa’uun sanadoota mirkaneessaa waliin sirreeffachuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Iyyata erga galchee booda odeeffannoo jijjiiruun ni danda’amaa?
answer: Sadarkaa adeemsaa irratti hundaa’uun ni danda’ama; waajjira saffisaan qunnami. (DEMO)

question: Guyyaa dhalootaa dogoggoraan guute yoo ta’e maal ta’a?
answer: Iyyanni didamuu ykn sirreeffamaaf deebiuu danda’a; ragaa sirrii dhiyeessi. (DEMO)

question: Sanada dabalataa yoo barbaadan akkamitti na beeksisu?
answer: SMS/imeeyil, bilbila, ykn status tracker irratti ergaa ni mul’ata. (DEMO)

question: Baayomeetirii booda iyyanni koo dhaabbachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; sanadoota hanqina, dogoggora odeeffannoo, ykn sakatta’iinsa irratti rakkoon yoo jiraate ni dhaabbata. (DEMO)

question: Adeemsa paaspoortii keessatti dallalaa (broker) fayyadamuun ni gorfama?
answer: Hin gorfamu; karaa mootummaa sirrii qofaan deemi, sobaa fi saaxilamuu irraa of eegi. (DEMO)

question: Yeroon dhumtii paaspoortii gabaabaa yoo ta’e visa ni gufata?
answer: Eeyyee; biyyoonni hedduun yeroon hojii gahaa akka hafu ni gaafatu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin yeroo hojjetamu osoo jiruu visa biraa iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Baay’ee rakkisaa; visa iyyachuuf paaspoortiin harkaa si keessa jiraachuun yeroo baay’ee barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Iyyata koo erga fudhatan booda haquu/cancel gochuu ni danda’a?
answer: Policy irratti hundaa’a; garuu kaffaltiin deebi’uu yeroo baay’ee hin jiru. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin koo maqaa nama biraatiin qophaa’e jedhanii yoo jedhan maal godha?
answer: Waajjira irratti qaamaan deemi; ID fi sanadoota eenyummaa sirrii dhiyeessi. (DEMO)

question: Maqaa fi teessoon waajjira paaspoortii eessa irraa argama?
answer: Marsariitii mootummaa, beeksisa waajjiraa, ykn bilbila tajaajila maamilaatiin argama. (DEMO)

question: Ragaan dhalootaa yoo hin jirre paaspoortii iyyachuu ni danda’a?
answer: Sanadoota eenyummaa mootummaa biroo (ID, ragaa mootummaa) bakka bu’uutti dhiyeessuun ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Gaaffii paaspoortii irratti waajjira qunnamuuf eessa bilbila?
answer: Lakkoofsa tajaajila maamila waajjiraa (hotline/contact) beeksisa mootummaa irraa barbaadi. (DEMO)

question: Jechaalee irratti yeroo baay’ee dhaga’aman (reference/biometric/renewal) jechuun maal?
answer: Reference = lakkoofsa hordoffii; Biometric = fingerprint/suuraa; Renewal = haaromsa; Replacement = bakka bu’iinsa. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imni paaspoortii maatii keessatti waliin galmaa’aa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee miti; namni hundi paaspoortii ofii qabaachuu qaba. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imaaf yeroon hojii paaspoortii ni gabaabaa?
answer: Qajeelfama irratti hundaa’uun ni danda’a; daa’imaaf yeroo hojii gabaabaa kennamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Bakka bu’iinsa yeroo godhamu baayomeetirii irra deebi’anii ni fudhatu?
answer: Eeyyee; yeroo baay’ee paaspoortii haaraa waliin baayomeetirii haaraa ni galmeessu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii koo akkamitti eega (protect) godha?
answer: Bakka nageenya qabu keessatti kaa’i, kooppii addaan tursiisi, bishaan/miidhaadhaan irraa eegi. (DEMO)

question: Koophiyaa paaspoortii bilbilaan (scan/photo) qabachuun ni gorfama?
answer: Bakka badii keessatti ni gargaara; garuu odeeffannoo dhuunfaa eegumsa (privacy) tiksuu yaadadhu. (DEMO)

question: Iyyanni koo akka hin turre (delay) maal gochuu qaba?
answer: Sanadoota hunda guuti, suuraa seera guutu dhiyeessi, odeeffannoo sirrii barreessi, beellama sirnaan kabaji. (DEMO)

question: E-passport chip keessatti odeeffannoon maal galma’a?
answer: Gosa e-passport yoo ta’e, odeeffannoo baayomeetirii fi eenyummaa muraasa chip keessatti qabata. (DEMO)

question: Chip e-passport yoo miidhame maal godha?
answer: Waajjira tajaajilaa qunnami; adeemsa sirreeffamaa ykn bakka bu’iinsa si qajeelchu. (DEMO)

question: Fuulonni paaspoortii yoo ciccitan rakkoo uuma?
answer: Eeyyee; visa/stamp irratti miidhaan yoo jiraate buufata daangaa irratti rakkoo uuma. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii irratti barreessuun ykn fooyyessuun ni eeyyamama?
answer: Hin eeyyamamu; paaspoortii miidhuun seeraan hin hayyamamu. (DEMO)

question: Maqaan koo Latin (ingiliffaan) akkamitti barreessama?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee sanadoota mootummaa irratti akka barreeffametti fudhatama; yoo garaagarummaa jiraate ragaan ni gaafama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin seera keessatti eenyummaa mirkaneessuuf ni fayyada?
answer: Eeyyee; paaspoortiin sanada mootummaa eenyummaa mirkaneessuuf bal’inaan fayyadu dha. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsaan booda odeeffannoon duraanii ni jijjiirama?
answer: Paaspoortiin haaraan lakkoofsa/daataa haaraa qabaachuu danda’a; odeeffannoon eenyummaa garuu sanadoota irratti hundaa’uun tura. (DEMO)

question: Daa’ima waliin imaluuf sanada dabalataa barbaachisaa?
answer: Biyyoonni muraasni xalayaa eeyyamaa warraa, ragaa walitti dhufeenya maatii, ykn guardianship ni gaafatu. (DEMO)

question: Abbaan ykn haati tokko qofa daa’ima waliin yoo deeme maal gaafatama?
answer: Eeyyama waaldaa/waajjira seeraa irraa kan biraa (consent) ykn murtii mana murtii ni gaafachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin qofti biyya kamiiyyuu seenuuf hayyama kennaa?
answer: Miti; paaspoortiin eenyummaa agarsiisa; seenuuf visa ykn hayyama imalaa biyya sanaa barbaachisuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii jechuun visa jechuun moo?
answer: Miti; paaspoortiin sanada eenyummaa; visa immoo hayyama seensaa/taa’umsa biyya biraa dha. (DEMO)

question: Status “Under Review” jechuun maal?
answer: Sanadoota fi odeeffannoo kee sakatta’uun/ irratti hojjechuun jiruu jechuudha. (DEMO)

question: Status “Rejected” jechuun maal?
answer: Iyyanni ulaagaa hin guunne jechuudha; sababni ni ibsama. (DEMO)

question: Status “Ready for Collection” jechuun maal?
answer: Paaspoortiin qophaa’e; dhuftee fudhachuuf qophiidha jechuudha. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii fudhachuuf receipt beellamaa qabachuun barbaachisaa?
answer: Ni gorfama; receipt/reference number fi ID qabachuun fudhannaa saffisa. (DEMO)

question: Yeroon hojii (validity) paaspoortii gosaan ni garaagara?
answer: Eeyyee; ramaddii fi tajaajila irratti hundaa’uun ni garaagara. (DEMO)

question: Bakka tajaajilli jiraachu isaa akkamitti mirkaneessa?
answer: Odeeffannoo mootummaa (marsariitii/beeksisa) irraa ykn waajjira bilbilaan mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii keessatti gosoonni tajaajilaa adda addaa jiru?
answer: Eeyyee; idile, tajaajila (service), fi diiploomaasii (diplomatic) fakkeenya. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii irratti mallattoon (signature) barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee eeyyee; daa’imaaf garuu qajeelfamni addaa jiraachuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Daa’imni signature paaspoortii irratti ni barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee hin barbaachisu; yookaan mallattoo warraa/guardianiitti hirkata. (DEMO)

question: SMS beeksisaa yoo na hin geenye maal gochuu danda’a?
answer: Reference numberiin status ilaali; yoo barbaachise tajaajila maamila waajjiraa qunnami. (DEMO)

question: Eenummaan iyyataa akkamitti mirkanaa’a?
answer: ID mootummaa, ragaa dhalootaa, fi sanadoota seeraa birootiin mirkanaa’a. (DEMO)

question: Sirreeffama paaspoortii yeroo kamiif barbaachisa?
answer: Maqaa, guyyaa dhalootaa, saala, ykn odeeffannoo biroo dogoggora yoo qabaate. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsa fi bakka bu’iinsa paaspoortii gidduutti maal garaagarummaa?
answer: Haaromsa = yeroon dhumtii irratti; bakka bu’iinsa = baduu/miidhamuu/ykn odeeffannoo jijjiiruu irratti. (DEMO)

question: Gaaffii paaspoortii irratti waajjira keessatti eenyu gaafadha?
answer: Bakka tajaajila maamila (information desk) ykn window qajeelchaatti gaafadhu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin seeraan qabamee turuu ni danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; dhimmoota seeraa murtaa’oo (murtii mana murtii) keessatti daangeffamuu danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Odeeffannoo dhuunfaa koo akka hin miidhamne maal eeguu qaba?
answer: Namoota hin amanamneef hin kennin; karaa mootummaa (official channels) qofaan hojjedhu. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortiin yoo bade gabaasni poolisii maaliif barbaachisa?
answer: Badii mirkaneessuuf, hammeenya ittisuuf, fi bakka bu’iinsa iyyachuuf ragaa ta’a. (DEMO)

question: Odeeffannoon paaspoortii fi sanada baankii/visa yoo hin wal simu maal ta’a?
answer: Tajaajila baankii/visa irratti gufuu uuma; odeeffannoo hunda walfakkaataa taasisuu barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Hojjetaan mootummaa tajaajila addaa (priority) ni argata?
answer: Yoo jiraate qajeelfama mootummaa irratti ibsama; odeeffannoo rasmiitti mirkaneessi. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuuf ragaa teessoo ni barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo muraasa ni gaafamuu danda’a; garuu yeroo baay’ee ID fi sanadoota eenyummaa qofaan ni danda’ama. (DEMO)

question: Paaspoortii iyyachuuf qorannoo fayyaa ni barbaachisaa?
answer: Yeroo baay’ee miti; garuu haala addaa (priority) irratti ragaa fayyaa ni barbaachisa. (DEMO)

question: Haaromsaan kaffaltiin ni jijjiiramaa?
answer: Eeyyee; gatiin tajaajila fi saffisa irratti hundaa’uun ni jijjiirama. (DEMO)

question: Mirkaneessaaf odeeffannoo maatii ni gaafamuu danda’a?
answer: Eeyyee; yeroo muraasa eenyummaa mirkaneessuuf odeeffannoo dabalataa ni gaafatu. (DEMO)

question: Iyyanni yoo hin milkoofne mirgi kootii maal?
answer: Sababa ifatti gaafachuu, komii dhiyeessuu, fi qajeelfama seeraa hordofuu ni danda’a. (DEMO)

question: Gaaffii baay’ee common paaspoortii irratti maali?
answer: Sanadoota barbaachisan, kaffaltii, beellama, baayomeetirii, status, haaromsa, fi bakka bu’iinsa irratti gaaffiin baay’ee ka’a. (DEMO)

question: የውሃ ክፍያ ለመክፈል ምን ያስፈልጋል?
answer: የውሃ ክፍያ ለመክፈል ማመልከቻ፣ የቦታው ካርታ፣ የባለቤትነት ማረጋገጫ እና የንብረት ታክስ ክፍያ ደረሰኝ ማቅረብ ያስፈልጋል፡፡ (DEMO)

question: የመብራት ክፍያ እንዴት መክፈል እችላለሁ?
answer: የመብራት ክፍያ በኢትዮጵያ ንግድ ባንክ ወይም በሞባይል ባንኪንግ መክፈል ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: የውሃ ሂሳቤን በኢንተርኔት ማየት እችላለሁ?
answer: አዎ፣ የውሃ ሂሳብዎን በрегиዮናል የውሃ አገልግሎት ድህረ ገጽ ወይም በ *889# ማየት ይችላሉ። (DEMO)

question: መብራት ቢጠፋ ምን ማድረግ አለኝ?
answer: መብራት ቢጠፋ በአቅራቢያዎ ለሚገኝ የጥገና ክፍል በ 905 ይደውሉ። (DEMO)

question: What documents are required to pay water bill?
answer: To pay water bill, you need to submit an application, land map, proof of ownership, and a property tax payment receipt. (DEMO)

question: How do I pay my electricity bill?
answer: You can pay your electricity bill at any Commercial Bank of Ethiopia branch or via mobile banking apps. (DEMO)

question: Can I check my water bill balance online?
answer: Yes, you can check your water balance through the official regional utility portal or by dialing *889#. (DEMO)

question: What should I do if I have a power outage?
answer: In case of a power outage, please contact the emergency maintenance line at 905. (DEMO)

question: Hojiiwwan mana fincaanii keessatti raawwataman kam fa’a?
answer: Hojiiwwan mana fincaanii keessatti raawwataman, hojiiwwan armaan gadii fa’a: (DEMO)

question: Kaffaltii ibsaa akkamittin kaffala?
answer: Kaffaltii ibsaa baankota daldalaa ykn tajaajila mobaayilii baankiin kaffaluun ni danda'ama. (DEMO)

question: Herrega bishaanii kiyya onlaayiniin ilaaluu nan danda'aa?
answer: Eeyyee, itti fayyadama bishaanii kee karaa poortaalii tajaajila bishaanii ykn lakkoofsa *889# argachuu dandeessa. (DEMO)

question: Yoo ibsaan bade maal gochuu qaba?
answer: Yoo humni ibsaa itti kute, lakkoofsa gargaarsaa ariifachiisaa 905 bilbiluun gabaasuu dandeessa. (DEMO)
